posts.title: Valorant
posts.description: Outwit, outmaneuver, and outgun your opponents to claim the title of ultimate tactician. Prepare for heart-pounding moments, strategic brilliance, and a shot at Valorant glory.🔫💥

rules.rule2: 📍 The winning team's IGL must report the match result to the admins after the match.
rules.rule3: 📍 In the event of your opponent failing to make contact or refusing to play the match, please contact the admins immediately for assistance.
rules.rule4: 📍 Both team IGL are encouraged to mutually agree on a map for the match.
rules.rule5: 📍 The winning team's captain must report the match result to the admins before 11:00 PM of the match days.

posts.title: e-Football
posts.description: Get ready to kick off the ultimate virtual showdown in the eFootball Tournament at Yukthi '24. Unleash your digital skills, strategize your plays, and compete for glory. It's not just a game; it's a high-stakes battle for e-soccer supremacy!

rules.rule1: 📍 Registered players are allotted to each group.
rules.rule2: 📍 Logo of the base team allotted should be used by the players throughout the tournament. The players will be identified by their game id, name and team crest.
rules.rule3: 📍 eFootball in Yukthi ‘24 follows group and knockout stage format where each team in the group will play each other in round robin format. There will be no home and away format.
rules.rule4: 📍 The club who wins in the finals will be crowned Yukthi ‘24 eFootball champion
rules.rule6: 📍 No extra time and penalties in the group stage matches.
rules.rule7: 📍 Team strength unlimited, any type of cards can be used.
rules.rule8: 📍Conditions of the players have to be set as Random.
rules.rule9: 📍 If there are any network issues in the first half, a new match has to be played from the start with the aggregate score of the disconnected match.
rules.rule10: 📍 If there are any network issues in the second half, a new match has to be played with the aggregate score of the disconnected match only till the HalfTime.
rules.rule11: 📍 Screenshot of the results has to be put showing the stats of the match by both teams.
rules.rule12: 📍 If a player is unable to play a match, the opponent will get a walkover win of 3 - 0, but these goals will not be added to the goal scoring sheet.
rules.rule13: 📍 If a player faces any kind of issues during the tournament, the player has to inform the Admins with solid proof.

posts.title: Free Fire
posts.content: Embrace the sizzle of intense battles
posts.description: Join the ranks of contenders as you navigate the fiery battlegrounds, where every move counts.🔫💥 Victory flickers on the horizon – the question beckons, are you prepared to turn up the heat and emerge as the true FreeFire champion❔

rules.rule1: 📍 A player should only register as a part of a single team.
rules.rule2: 📍 Teams that attempt to use players which are not registered in their team may be disqualified.
rules.rule3: 📍 All players must remain in the game’s lobby following the conclusion of each match. This allows us to view their final score on the scoreboard.
rules.rule4: 📍 Players that leave the lobby earlier and thus do not show up on the scoreboard may be suspended from on-going tournaments.
rules.rule5: 📍 Once the match has started, only the players that are in the lobby are eligible to play. In the case of a player disconnecting and is not able to join back, a team is allowed to have a registered player on their team to substitute. This is allowed only once.
rules.rule6: 📍 It is not allowed to switch to the spectator mode. If a player is caught using the spectator mode, that team will automatically have to forfeit the current round of that match.
rules.rule7: 📍 Abusing in-game glitches or bugs that give a team an unfair advantage is not permitted. Teams caught doing so may be disqualified.
rules.rule8: 📍 The usage of ‘jailbroken’ or ‘rooted’ devices in tournament matches is not permitted.
rules.rule9: 📍 Use of emulators or controllers is prohibited.
rules.rule10: 📍 Do not join an official tournament lobby if you are not part of the team that is playing. Ineligible players that do join are at risk of being banned from the tournament or receive other penalties.
rules.rule11: 📍 All teams are required to properly go through the tournament rules, regulations and guidelines and contact the representatives to clear any queries.
rules.rule12: 📍 By participating in our tournaments, all participants automatically agree that they vow to respect fellow participants and organizers.
rules.rule13: 📍 If any more rules apply, then they may be found in the tournament’s registration article.

posts.title: Battlegrounds Mobile
posts.description: Tug of War is a competitive sport where two teams pull opposite ends of a rope, with the goal of pulling the other team over a center line. It requires teamwork, strength, and strategy to win.

posts.title: Spanathon
posts.content: Learn how to design and build strong and stable bridges with this Bridge making workshop! 🌉
posts.description: Join us for a comprehensive and hands-on workshop that will teach you the basics and skills of bridge engineering. You will learn about the different types of bridges, such as arch, beam, truss, suspension, and cable-stayed bridges, and how they transfer loads and resist forces. You will also design and fabricate your own bridge model using various materials and test its strength and efficiency. You will also discover the real-world applications and challenges of bridge engineering in various domains and sectors.

rules.rule1: 💎 Unmoulded moulds will be given in the spot.
rules.rule3: 💎 Only  provided equipments are allowed to use.
rules.rule6: 💎 Moulds should be tightened within the specified time.
rules.rule7: 💎 Any kind of malpractices will be lead to direct disqualification.
rules.rule8: 💎 One who complety set up the cube first will be the winner.

posts.title: Web Hunt
posts.content: Are you ready to hunt for the hidden clues and secrets on the web? Join Web Hunt today! 🕵️
posts.description: Web Hunt is a fun and challenging competition that will test your web browsing and searching skills. You will have to follow a trail of clues, puzzles, and riddles across various websites and platforms, such as blogs, social media, forums, and more. You will have to find hidden codes, passwords, or messages within the given challenges. The team or individual with the most points at the end of the competition wins the prize and the glory.

rules.rule1: 💎 Unmoulded moulds will be given in the spot.
rules.rule3: 💎 Only  provided equipments are allowed to use.
rules.rule6: 💎 Moulds should be tightened within the specified time.
rules.rule7: 💎 Any kind of malpractices will be lead to direct disqualification.
rules.rule8: 💎 One who complety set up the cube first will be the winner.

posts.title: Capture the Flag
posts.content: Test your hacking skills and challenge yourself with this CTF competition! 🏁
posts.description: Join us for a thrilling and competitive CTF competition that will put your cybersecurity knowledge and abilities to the test. You will face a series of challenges across multiple categories, such as web, crypto, reversing, forensics, and more. You will have to find hidden flags, which are strings of text or digital artifacts, within the given challenges. The team or individual with the most points at the end of the competition wins the prize and the glory.

rules.rule1: 1. Contestants can use their personal laptops otherwise one shall be provided by the college
rules.rule2: 2. Should have a strong internet connection as the competition was taken on a speed typing website
rules.rule3: 3. You will be given a copy of the content to be typed
rules.rule4: 4. All the rules are based on the number of participating participants and can be changed if participants are less
rules.rule5: 5. The time, content and threshold for the first round will be revealed during the event

posts.title: Keyboard Mastery
posts.content: Learn how to type faster and more accurately with this keyboard mastery workshop! ⌨️
posts.description: Join us for a comprehensive and hands-on workshop that will teach you the basics and skills of keyboarding. You will learn how to use the correct finger placement, posture, and technique to improve your typing speed and accuracy. You will also learn about the best practices, tools, and games for keyboarding and how to apply them to different domains and sectors.

rules.rule1: 📍 Participants can only edit the sourcecode. They cannot enter their own code other than the above.
rules.rule2: 📍 Sample inputs will be provided. Output should match the given output.
rules.rule3: 📍 Special cases would also be considered.

posts.title: Blind Programming
posts.content: Show off your coding skills and confidence with this blind programming competition! 🙈
posts.description: Join us for a challenging and fun competition that will test your coding abilities without a problem statement. You will be given a piece of code that may contain errors or bugs that you need to fix in order to make it work correctly. You will also have to figure out the input and output formats, the logic, and the expected output of the code. The team or individual with the most correct and efficient solutions wins the prize and the bragging rights.

rules.rule1: 📍 Participants can only edit the sourcecode. They cannot enter their own code other than the above.
rules.rule2: 📍 Sample inputs will be provided. Output should match the given output.
rules.rule3: 📍 Special cases would also be considered.

posts.title: SegFault - Treasure Hunt
posts.content: Are you ready to hunt for the ultimate cyber treasure? 💻
posts.description: Segfault is a thrilling and competitive treasure hunt competition that will challenge your computer science skills and knowledge. You will have to follow a trail of clues, puzzles, and challenges across various domains and platforms, such as web, crypto, reversing, forensics, and more. You will have to find hidden flags, which are strings of text or digital artifacts, within the given challenges. The team or individual with the most points at the end of the competition wins the prize and the glory.

rules.rule1: 📍 Participants can only edit the sourcecode. They cannot enter their own code other than the above.

rules.rule3: 📍 Special cases would also be considered.

posts.title: Pro Programmer
posts.content: Are you a pro at programming? Prove it with the Pro Programmer competition! 💯
posts.description: Join us for a challenging and rewarding competition that will test your programming skills and knowledge. You will face a series of problems across multiple domains and languages, such as web, data structures, algorithms, databases, and more. You will have to write efficient, elegant, and bug-free code that passes all the test cases and meets the specifications. The team or individual with the highest score at the end of the competition wins the prize and the recognition.

posts.title: AR/VR Workshop
posts.content: Experience the magic of AR/VR with this amazing workshop! 🔮
posts.description: Join us for a fun and interactive workshop that will teach you the basics and possibilities of augmented and virtual reality. You will learn how to create your own AR/VR projects. You will also explore the different use cases and benefits of AR/VR in various fields and sectors.

rules.rule3: 📌 The entry fee of ₹100 will be refunded upon completion. It is treated as a caution deposit.
rules.rule4: 📌 No prior experience in the field is necessary.

posts.title: 3D Printing Workshop
posts.content: Ready to unleash your creativity with 3D printing? Join us today! 🖨️
posts.description: Yukthi '24, the National level Technocultural fest hosted by STIST, invites you to an exciting and hands-on 🛠️3D PRINTING🛠️ workshop that will teach you how to design, slice, and print your own 3D models. You will also learn about the various applications and benefits of 3D printing in different industries and domains.

rules.rule3: 📌 The entry fee of ₹100 will be refunded upon completion. It is treated as a caution deposit.
rules.rule4: 📌 No prior experience in the field is necessary.

posts.title: Blockchain Workshop
posts.content: Discover the power and potential of Blockchain with this awesome workshop! 🔗
posts.description: Join us for a comprehensive and engaging workshop that will teach you the fundamentals and applications of Blockchain technology. You will learn how Blockchain works, why it is secure and decentralized, and how it can be used to create innovative solutions for various domains and sectors. You will also get hands-on experience with creating and interacting with smart contracts, cryptocurrencies, and decentralized applications.

rules.rule3: 📌 The entry fee of ₹100 will be refunded upon completion. It is treated as a caution deposit.
rules.rule4: 📌 No prior experience in the field is necessary.

posts.title: AI/LLM Workshop
posts.content: Learn how to harness the power of LLMs for generative AI applications! 💡
posts.description: Join us for a comprehensive and hands-on workshop that will teach you how to use large language models (LLMs) for generative AI tasks. You will learn how to select, fine-tune, and deploy LLMs for various domains and use cases. You will also gain practical skills and insights on how to create and evaluate generative AI solutions using state-of-the-art tools and frameworks.

rules.rule3: 📌 The entry fee of ₹100 will be refunded upon completion. It is treated as a caution deposit.
rules.rule4: 📌 No prior experience in the field is necessary.

posts.title: Robotics Workshop
posts.content: Explore the fascinating world of robotics with this hands-on workshop! 🤖
posts.description: Join us for a fun and interactive workshop that will teach you the basics and applications of robotics. You will learn how to design, build, and program your own robots using various sensors, motors, and controllers. You will also discover the different types of robots and how they are used in various domains and sectors.

rules.rule3: 📌 The entry fee of ₹100 will be refunded upon completion. It is treated as a caution deposit.

posts.title: Hardware Hacking
posts.content: Learn how to reverse engineer, manipulate, and compromise electronic systems with this Hardware Hacking workshop! 🔧
posts.description: Join us for a one-day workshop that will teach you the basics and possibilities of hardware hacking. You will learn how to identify key components on a PCB, how to interface with various serial protocols, how to dump and analyze firmware, and how to exploit common hardware vulnerabilities. You will also get hands-on experience with various tools and techniques for hardware hacking and reverse engineering

rules.rule4: 📌 No prior experience in the field is necessary.

posts.title: Web Development Workshop
posts.content: Learn how to build stunning websites with this web dev workshop! 💻
posts.description: Join us for a comprehensive and hands-on workshop that will teach you the basics and skills of web development. You will learn how to use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create responsive, interactive, and beautiful websites. You will also learn about the best practices, tools, and frameworks for web development and how to deploy your websites online.

posts.title: UI/UX Workshop
posts.content: Learn how to design user-friendly and engaging interfaces with this UI/UX workshop! 🎨
posts.description: Join us for a comprehensive and hands-on workshop that will teach you the basics and skills of UI/UX design. You will learn how to use various tools and methods to conduct user research, create wireframes and prototypes, and test and iterate your designs. You will also learn about the best practices, principles, and trends of UI/UX design and how to apply them to different domains and sectors.

rules.rule3: 📌 The entry fee of ₹100 will be refunded upon completion. It is treated as a caution deposit.
